articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: You can now share live video with emergency services on Android - TechCrunch
articles.description: This feature could help give emergency dispatchers context in circumstances like car accidents, fires, or medical crises.
articles.content: Google launched Android Emergency Live Video on Wednesday, which allows people to stream video when contacting emergency responders. This feature could help give first responders extra context in cir… [+977 chars]
